mapper.insert: insert into tb_character (user_seq, category_number, nickname, introduction, character_created_date, alarm_allow, like_alarm, reply_alarm, follow_alarm, modify_alarm) values (#{userSeq}, #{categoryNumber}, #{nickname}, #{introduction}, now(), true, true, true, true, true)
mapper.update:
update tb_character set
nickname=#{nickname},
introduction=#{introduction},
representative_achievement=#{representativeAchievement},
character_modified_date = now() where character_seq=#{characterSeq}

update tb_character set
alarm_allow=#{alarmAllow},
like_alarm=#{likeAlarm},
reply_alarm=#{replyAlarm},
follow_alarm=#{followAlarm},
modify_alarm=#{modifyAlarm},
character_modified_date = now() where character_seq=#{characterSeq}
update tb_character set character_active=0, character_delete_reason=#{characterDeleteReason}, character_modified_date = now() where character_seq=#{characterSeq}
update tb_file set file_is_active = 0, file_modified_date = now() where relation_tb = 'tb_character' AND file_is_active = 1 AND relation_seq = #{characterSeq}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_character where nickname=#{nickname} AND character_active = 1

select c.character_seq, c.user_seq, c.nickname, c.category_number, c.introduction, c.representative_achievement, c.alarm_allow, c.like_alarm, c.reply_alarm, c.follow_alarm, c.modify_alarm, c.reported_time, character_active, c.character_created_date, c.character_modified_date, u.user_id, f.file_path, f.file_name from tb_character c JOIN tb_user u ON c.user_seq = u.user_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file f ON f.relation_tb = 'tb_character' AND f.file_is_active = 1 AND f.relation_seq = c.character_seq where character_seq=#{characterSeq} AND character_active = 1

select c.character_seq, c.introduction, c.representative_achievement, characterFile.file_path AS profileImagePath, characterFile.file_name AS profileImageName, achieveFile.file_path AS achievementImagePath, achieveFile.file_name AS achievementImageName, ca.character_category_name AS category_name, (SELECT count(*) FROM tb_content where character_seq = c.character_seq AND content_is_active = 1) AS content_count, (SELECT count(*) FROM tb_follow where followee = c.character_seq) AS follower_count, (SELECT count(*) FROM tb_follow where follower = c.character_seq) AS followee_count from tb_character c LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_character_category ca ON ca.character_category_number = c.category_number LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file achieveFile ON achieveFile.relation_tb = 'tb_achievement' AND achieveFile.relation_seq = c.representative_achievement AND achieveFile.file_is_active = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file characterFile ON characterFile.relation_tb = 'tb_character' AND characterFile.relation_seq = c.character_seq AND characterFile.file_is_active = 1 where nickname=#{nickname} AND character_active = 1

select c.character_seq, c.user_seq, c.nickname, c.category_number, c.introduction, c.representative_achievement, c.alarm_allow, c.like_alarm, c.reply_alarm, c.follow_alarm, c.modify_alarm, c.reported_time, character_active, c.character_created_date, c.character_modified_date, f.file_path, f.file_name from tb_character c LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file f ON f.relation_tb = 'tb_character' AND f.relation_seq = c.character_seq AND f.file_is_active = 1 where user_seq=#{userSeq} AND character_active = 1
select count(*) from tb_character where user_seq=#{userSeq} and character_active = 1
select count(*) from tb_character where nickname=#{nickname} and character_active = 1
